mapper.select: SELECT s.USER_ID USER_ID, s.USERNAME USERNAME, s.PASSWORD PASSWORD, s.ROLE_ID ROLE_ID, s.EMAIL EMAIL, s.ISLOCKED ISLOCKED, s.REMARK REMARK FROM sys_user s where s.PASSWORD = #{realpass}
SELECT s.USER_ID USER_ID, s.USERNAME USERNAME, s.PASSWORD PASSWORD, s.NAME NAME, s.ROLE_ID ROLE_ID, s.EMAIL EMAIL, s.NUMBER NUMBER, s.ISLOCKED ISLOCKED, s.REMARK REMARK FROM sys_user s

SELECT u.USER_ID USER_ID, u.USERNAME USERNAME, u.EMAIL EMAIL, u.ISLOCKED ISLOCKED, u.REMARK REMARK, u.CREATERIGHT CREATERIGHT, u.UPDATERIGHT UPDATERIGHT, u.DELETERIGHT DELETERIGHT, r.ROLE_ID ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_NAME ROLE_NAME FROM sys_user u, sys_role r WHERE TRUE AND u.role_id = r.role_id order by u.USER_ID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( USERNAME, NAME, EMAIL, ROLE_ID ) VALUES( #{loginname}, #{inputname}, #{email}, #{rolename} )
